description.intro: Hello! I'm Konrad, a young and ambitious Junior Web / Frontene Developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites and webapps. I have a solid foundation in web programming and a keen desire for continuous learning and growth.
description.skills: I have experience in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and in using popular libraries and frameworks, including React.js. I'm capable of building responsive websites that provide excellent user experiences across various devices.
description.goals: My career goals include participating in projects that allow me to develop as a developer, gaining knowledge about industry best practices, and applying my passion and creativity to create innovative web solutions.
description.contact: If you're looking for an energetic and capable Junior Web Developer ready to contribute to your projects, I'd love to hear from you!

projects.Alkopoly: My version of Monopoly for me and my friends. Every element of this browser game is made for us, for example properties are from our village. Doing this I use Vite, HTML, CSS, JS and Node with express.js, because this game has a multiplayer.
projects.Rowerowe Narty: Rowerowe Narty is a browser game where you have to watch out on obstacles, get boosts and coins and reach the highest score possible. Whole game is made in canvas element. I’m planning made this project again in near future but in ReactJS.
projects.graboga.pl: In my school I made browser game where you can draw cards with pictures of teachers and play some mini games like clicker. Doing this I’ve learned a lot of Front-End and Back-End.
projects.Scam and Run: Website for a simple dropshipping web store. It has login and reviews system, cart functions and admin panel. I made this page secured from SQL Injections so it’s safe.
projects.Debt Tracker: WEb app for tracking your debtors made by using ReactJS. For now there’re options to add, delete and edit your debtors. Website has dark ang light mode and 2 languages options.
